00039 class ApiPrint extends Database
00040 {
00047   private static $html_tmp_folder = null;
00048   
00055   private static $pdf_tmp_folder  = null;
00056   
00063   private static $default_options = array(
00064     'title'                     => '',
00065     'grayscale'                 => 0,
00066     'copies'                    => 1,
00067     'orientation'               => 'Portrait',
00068     'page-size'                 => 'A4',
00069     'margin-bottom'             => '10mm',
00070     'margin-left'               => '10mm',
00071     'margin-right'              => '10mm',
00072     'margin-top'                => '10mm',
00073     'toc'                       => 0,
00074     'print-media-type'          => 1,
00075     'background'                => 1,
00076     'images'                    => 1,
00077     'enable-external-links'     => 1,
00078     'enable-local-file-access'  => 1,
00079   );

00089   public function __construct()
00090   {
00091     $this->table = 'api_print';
00092     
00093     $this->def_datas = array(
00094       'id_user' => PDO::PARAM_INT, // l'identifiant de l'utilisateur appellant la page
00095       'url'     => PDO::PARAM_STR, // l'URL de la page à imprimer
00096       'content' => PDO::PARAM_STR, // le contenu de la page à imprimer (si pas d'URL)
00097       'md5'     => PDO::PARAM_STR, // le md5 du contenu de la page ou de l'url
00098       'nb'      => PDO::PARAM_INT, // le nombre de fois que la page a été imprimé
00099     );
00100     
00101     $this->initDatas();
00102   }
00103   
00104   
00115   public static function retrieveByUserAndMd5(ApiPrintUser $user, $md5)
00116   {
00117     if (is_string($md5) === false || empty($md5) === true) {
00118       throw new Exception('MD5 must be a no empty string');
00119     }
00120     
00121     $api_print = new ApiPrint();
00122     
00123     $sql  = 'SELECT * FROM '.$api_print->getTableName().' ';
00124     $sql .= 'WHERE id_user = :id_user AND md5 = :md5';
00125     
00126     $stmt = Database::getSingleton()->prepare($sql);
00127     
00128     $stmt->bindValue(':id_user', $user->getId(), PDO::PARAM_INT);
00129     $stmt->bindValue(':md5', $md5, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00130     
00131     $res = $stmt->execute();
00132     
00133     if ($res === false) {
00134       if (DEBUG === true) {
00135         ob_start();
00136         $stmt->debugDumpParams();
00137         $error = ob_get_contents();
00138         ob_end_clean();
00139         throw new Exception('Error in the query : '.$error);
00140       }
00141       return null;
00142     }
00143     
00144     $result = $stmt->fetch(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC);
00145     if ($result === false) {
00146       return null;
00147     }
00148     
00149     $api_print->load($result);
00150     return $api_print;
00151   }
00152   
00153   
00164   public function printPage($options = array())
00165   {
00166     $url = $this->getUrl();
00167     $content = $this->getContent();
00168     
00169     // merge options with default options
00170     $options = array_merge(ApiPrint::$default_options, $options);
00171     
00172     // if cache enable, get cache file
00173     if (PRINT_ENABLE_CACHE === true) {
00174       $result = $this->getCached($options);
00175     } else {
00176       $result = null;
00177     }
00178     
00179     // No cache return, convert
00180     if ($result === null) {
00181       if (empty($url) === false) {
00182         $result = $this->printUrl($options);
00183       } elseif (empty($content) === false) {
00184         $result = $this->printContent($options);
00185       }
00186     }
00187     
00188     if ($result === false) {
00189       throw new Exception('Fail to print');
00190     }
00191     
00192     // increase the number of print
00193     $this->setNb($this->getNb() + 1);
00194     
00195     return $result;
00196   }
00197   
00198   
00207   private function getCached($options = array())
00208   {
00209     $md5 = $this->getMd5();
00210     
00211     if (empty($md5) === true) {
00212       throw new Exception('md5 can\'t be empty');
00213     }
00214     
00215     $filename = ApiPrint::getPdfTmpFilename($md5, $options);
00216     
00217     if (file_exists($filename) === true && filemtime($filename) > time() - PRINT_TIME_CACHE) {
00218       return $filename;
00219     }
00220     
00221     return null;
00222   }
00223   
00224   
00234   private function printUrl($options = array())
00235   {
00236     $url = $this->getUrl();
00237     $md5 = $this->getMd5();
00238     
00239     if (empty($url) === true || empty($md5) === true) {
00240       throw new Exception('url and md5 can\'t be empty');
00241     }
00242     
00243     // printUrl allow only http or https protocol
00244     if ((bool)preg_match('/^https?:/', $url) === false) {
00245       throw new Exception('url must be HTTP protocole');
00246     }
00247     
00248     $pdf_filename = ApiPrint::getPdfTmpFilename($md5, $options);
00249     
00250     return $this->printCmd($url, $pdf_filename, $options);
00251   }
00252   
00253   
00263   private function printContent($options = array())
00264   {
00265     $content = $this->getContent();
00266     $md5 = $this->getMd5();
00267     
00268     if (empty($content) === true || empty($md5) === true) {
00269       throw new Exception('Content and md5 can\'t be empty');
00270     }
00271     
00272     $html_filename = ApiPrint::getHtmlTmpFolder().'/'.$md5.'.html';
00273     if (file_put_contents($html_filename, $content) === false) {
00274       throw new Exception('unable to create HTML tmp file');
00275     }
00276     
00277     $pdf_filename = ApiPrint::getPdfTmpFilename($md5, $options);
00278     
00279     return $this->printCmd($html_filename, $pdf_filename, $options);
00280   }
00281   
00282   
00293   private function printCmd($url, $pdf, $options = array())
00294   {
00295     if (empty($url) === true || empty($pdf) === true) {
00296       throw new Exception('url and pdf can\'t be empty');
00297     }
00298     
00299     if (file_exists(PRINT_BIN) === false) {
00300       throw new Exception('the convert program doesn\'t exists');
00301     }
00302     
00303     if (file_exists($pdf) === true) {
00304       // On supprime l'ancien PDF avant
00305       unlink($pdf);
00306     }
00307     
00308     $command = escapeshellcmd(PRINT_BIN);
00309     
00310     // Ajout des options si necessaire
00311     $command .= ApiPrintOption::getOptions($options);
00312     
00313     $command .= ' '.PRINT_CONSTANT_OPTIONS;
00314     
00315     $command .= ' '.escapeshellarg($url).' '.escapeshellarg($pdf);
00316     
00317     $res = exec($command, $output, $return);
00318     if ($return !== 0) {
00319       if (DEBUG === true) {
00320         throw new Exception('Error in command line : '.$command."\n".$res."\n".print_r($output, true));
00321       }
00322       return false;
00323     } else {
00324       return $pdf;
00325     }
00326   }
00327   
00328   
00338   private static function getHtmlTmpFolder()
00339   {
00340     if (ApiPrint::$html_tmp_folder === null) {
00341       $folder = PRINT_TMP.'/html';
00342       if (file_exists($folder) === false || is_dir($folder) === false) {
00343         if (mkdir($folder, 0777, true) === false) {
00344           throw new Exception('Impossible to create HTML temp folder');
00345         }
00346       }
00347       ApiPrint::$html_tmp_folder = $folder;
00348     }
00349     
00350     return ApiPrint::$html_tmp_folder;
00351   }
00352   
00353   
00362   private static function getPdfTmpFolder()
00363   {
00364     if (ApiPrint::$pdf_tmp_folder === null) {
00365       $folder = PRINT_TMP.'/pdf';
00366       if (file_exists($folder) === false || is_dir($folder) === false) {
00367         if (mkdir($folder, 0777, true) === false) {
00368           throw new Exception('Impossible to create HTML temp folder');
00369         }
00370       }
00371       ApiPrint::$pdf_tmp_folder = $folder;
00372     }
00373     
00374     return ApiPrint::$pdf_tmp_folder;
00375   }
00376   
00377   
00388   private static function getPdfTmpFilename($md5, $options = array())
00389   {
00390     $folder = ApiPrint::getPdfTmpFolder();
00391     $filename = sha1($md5.serialize($options));
00392     
00393     return $folder.'/'.$filename.'.pdf';
00394   }
00395 }
